```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
cn <- read_csv("CN_all.csv")
cn_calc <- cn %>%
  mutate(N_mass = Weight_mg*N_Pct/100,
         C_mass = Weight_mg*C_Pct/100)

cn_calc
```
